column5: I am sorry for flaunting the fact that we were growing grass and in shorts...... Can you all please call your weather back it to dang cold down here now.   Art
lol, don't worry about it. Enjoy your weather.
We'll just let you have a few days of it - to think about what you did - then we'll see about gettin' you back your shorts weather.   Don
It's cold, windy and snowing in Toronto Art, would you like a bit of the white stuff sent down your way too ??
No need to send it Lew it's here.  Way to go Art  Whopper
Hell the ground is white out here today, that is after a couple of days or heavy rain that washed away most of the snow.

I've been working my tail off getting things done to try to have a 4 day weekend...it doesn't look good. Woke up to trees heavy with freshly fallen snow. Looked at the 10 day forcast here and it looks as though there'll be snow/rain for the next week till Saturday. But hey, I'm breathing, mobile, have food on the table, my kids are healthy. It could be a lot worse.  Have a great day.
OK hows about this deal if you all stop sending the cold stuff down here we will see about making it warmer up their. ?deal?  Art
23f here with 30 mile an hour winds, I can barely see the grass. Must be hockey weather?
froze my butt off this morning doing garbage
You take the garbage out?,thought that was the wifes job.   Yep global warming at it,s finest. It really sucks Art,even for up here.

Hey Art, no worries from me, despite my 3 word response in your previous post.  Just made me realize that I don't wanna deal with moving snow this late in the year(much to my regret, have to today), AND............................. you mentioned cutting GRASS!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Temperature regardless!!!  Now, I don't much care about what people post, but I HATES cutting grass,   :lol: That was the killer for me  :wallbash:
